# It seems that I am still unable to harvest stone, as the error indicates there is nothing within reach to harvest. 
# This could be due to a few reasons: the stone patch may have been depleted, or I may not be positioned correctly.

# To troubleshoot, I will first inspect my surroundings to confirm the presence of stone resources.
# I will check the nearby resources to see if there are any stones available for harvesting.

nearby_resources = inspect_nearby_resources()
print(f"Nearby resources: {nearby_resources}")

# If stone is available, I will adjust my position accordingly to ensure I can harvest it.
# If not, I may need to explore further to find another stone patch.
